hero.title: Natural Beauty|Real Results
hero.subtitle: Premium eco-friendly cosmetics crafted with care for you and our planet
features.natural_ingredients.description: Only the finest natural ingredients — gentle on your skin and kind to the environment.
features.cruelty_free.description: Beauty without cruelty. None of our products are or ever will be tested on animals.
features.fast_shipping.description: Fast delivery throughout Europe. Free shipping in Lithuania on orders over €50.
promises.you.description: We believe in beauty with a conscience. From cruelty-free formulas to plastic-free packaging, we're here to help you look and feel great without compromising our planet.
promises.planet.description: Every product is a love letter to nature. Gentle on your skin, safe for the environment. For us, sustainability isn't just a trend — it's a daily commitment we share with you.

about.title: About Us
about.meta_description: Discover Shop Natural — a family-run business in Lithuania dedicated to eco-friendly, cruelty-free cosmetics. 100% natural ingredients, sustainable packaging.
about.meta_keywords: natural cosmetics, eco-friendly beauty, cruelty-free, sustainable skincare, family business Lithuania, organic products
about.heading: About Us
about.hero_subtitle: A family business dedicated to eco-friendly, natural products that enhance your everyday life
about.roots_content: Shop Natural is a family-run business dedicated to offering eco-friendly, natural products that enhance your everyday life. We believe in the power of nature and sustainability, which is why every item in our shop has been carefully curated to meet the highest environmental standards.
about.commitments_subtitle: What drives us every single day
about.commitment_1_desc: All our packaging materials are designed to minimize environmental impact.
about.commitment_2_desc: We partner exclusively with suppliers who share our environmental values.
about.commitment_3_desc: We are proud to be cruelty-free and never test on animals.
about.why_1_desc: As a family business, we prioritize customer relationships and personalized service.
about.why_2_desc: No hidden chemicals or harmful additives — just pure, natural ingredients you can trust.
about.why_3_desc: From sourcing to delivery, we care for the environment.
about.vision_content_1: We strive for a future where our operations reduce our carbon footprint – offering refill options and exploring innovative packaging solutions.
about.vision_content_2: We want to be more than just a shop – we want to create a community of people who care about the planet and a responsible future.
about.impact_content: When you buy our products, you're not just purchasing an item – you're supporting a healthier planet. Part of our profits goes to forest restoration and environmental protection.
return_policy.title: Return Policy
return_policy.meta_description: Shop Natural return policy. 14-day hassle-free returns under EU law. Full refund within 5-7 business days. Customer satisfaction guaranteed.
return_policy.meta_keywords: return policy, 14 day returns, EU consumer rights, refund cosmetics, exchange products
return_policy.heading: Return Policy
return_policy.intro: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. Please review our return policy below.
return_policy.right_to_return_content: Under European Union law, you have the right to return your purchase within 14 days of receiving your order, without needing to provide a reason.
return_policy.conditions_content: To be eligible for a return, the product must be unused, undamaged, and in its original packaging. Please ensure all labels and seals remain intact.
return_policy.process_content: To initiate a return, please contact us via email at info@naturalmente.lt with your order number and reason for return. We will provide you with return instructions.
return_policy.shipping_content: Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer unless the product is defective or we made an error in your order. Please pack items securely to prevent damage during transit.
return_policy.refund_content: Once we receive and inspect your return, we will process your refund within 5-7 business days. The refund will be issued to your original payment method.
return_policy.contact_content: If you have any questions about our return policy or need assistance with a return, please do not hesitate to contact us.
shipping_policy.title: Shipping Policy
shipping_policy.meta_title: Shipping Policy — Fast Delivery to Lithuania & EU
shipping_policy.meta_description: Shop Natural shipping info. Fast delivery: Lithuania 1-3 days, EU 3-10 days. Free shipping on orders over €50 in Lithuania. Track your order online.
shipping_policy.meta_keywords: shipping Lithuania, delivery EU, free shipping cosmetics, parcel tracking, fast delivery
shipping_policy.heading: Shipping Policy
shipping_policy.intro: We are committed to delivering your natural products quickly and safely. Please review our shipping information below.
shipping_policy.methods_content: We offer convenient delivery through trusted courier services and parcel locker networks. Choose the option that works best for you at checkout.
shipping_policy.costs_content: Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on your location, package size, and delivery method. We strive to keep shipping fees as low as possible.
shipping_policy.international_content: We ship to all European Union countries. Please note that international orders may be subject to customs duties and import taxes, which are the responsibility of the customer.
shipping_policy.issues_content: If your package is delayed, damaged, or lost during shipping, please contact us immediately at info@naturalmente.lt. We will work with you and our shipping partners to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.
shipping_policy.tracking_content: Once your order ships, you will receive a confirmation email with tracking information. You can monitor your delivery status in real-time through your account or the provided tracking link.
shipping_policy.eu_countries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom, Norway, Switzerland
shipping_policy.venipak_pickup_desc: Pick up from convenient Venipak location
shipping_policy.lt_free_shipping: Free shipping in Lithuania for orders over €50
privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.meta_title: Privacy Policy — GDPR Compliant Data Protection
privacy_policy.meta_description: Shop Natural privacy policy. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. GDPR compliant. Your privacy and security are our priority.
privacy_policy.meta_keywords: privacy policy, GDPR, data protection, personal data, cookies policy, Lithuania
privacy_policy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy_policy.controller_content: UAB "Naturalbeauty DS" is the data controller responsible for processing your personal information in accordance with GDPR and Lithuanian data protection laws.
privacy_policy.personal_info_content: Name, email address, phone number, shipping and billing addresses when you place an order or create an account.
privacy_policy.usage_data_content: IP address, browser type, device information, pages visited, and browsing behavior to improve our website experience.
privacy_policy.third_party_content: We may supplement data from public databases and commercial data providers to enhance our service.
privacy_policy.process_1: To fulfill and deliver your orders
privacy_policy.process_2: To improve our website and customer experience
privacy_policy.process_3: To communicate about orders, promotions, and updates
privacy_policy.process_4: For direct marketing purposes (only with your consent)
privacy_policy.cookies_content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your browsing experience. Cookies are stored on your device only with your consent and can be disabled in your browser settings at any time.
privacy_policy.sharing_intro: We may share your data with trusted third parties:
privacy_policy.sharing_1: Courier and delivery services to fulfill orders
privacy_policy.sharing_4: Legal authorities when required by law
privacy_policy.retention_content: We retain your personal data for a maximum of 5 years from your last interaction with us, unless a longer retention period is required by law (e.g., for accounting or tax purposes).
privacy_policy.rights_intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacy_policy.right_1: Access your personal data (free of charge)
privacy_policy.right_3: Request deletion of your data (subject to legal obligations)
privacy_policy.right_4: Object to direct marketing at any time
privacy_policy.gdpr_content: We are committed to protecting your personal data in full compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Lithuanian data protection laws. Your privacy and security are our top priorities.
privacy_policy.contact_content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:
